name: ghomap
author: ghom
description: Enmap like using json files in local

scripts.prettier: prettier src test.js jest.config.js package.json readme.md tsconfig.json --write
scripts.build: del-cli dist/** -d && tsc && npm run build:docs
scripts.build:docs: del-cli docs/** -d && typedoc --excludeNotDocumented --exclude src/utils.ts --name "Ghomap Librairy" --out docs/ src/
scripts.deploy: git reset --hard && git pull && npm i && npm run build && pm2 restart ghomap
